title: The Top 5 Longreads of the Week
content: In this edition: gambling’s grip, a story of plumes and poachers, bemoaning American tourists in Rome, a magical history tour, and a fake poultry flinger.
creator: Longreads

title: Will Dad and I Ever See Texas the Same Way?
content: "A noted Texas historian and his adult child get behind the wheel to see if they can finally view their home state the same way."
creator: Carolyn Wells

title: Why Did the Rubber Chicken Cross the Road?
content: "At 38, I began to feel the creep of the millennial midlife crisis. So I decided to break the strangest world record I could find."
creator: Brendan Fitzgerald

title: How to Become a Tree
content: "Many people today want to commit their remains to rejuvenating the planet. But are these green deaths just greenwashing?"
creator: Cheri Lucas Rowlands

title: How Pronghorns Outran the Ice Age
content: "Can they outrun an uncertain climate future?"
creator: Carolyn Wells

title: Plume: A Tale of Murder and Martyrdom in the Everglades
content: "Guy Bradley gave his life to save South Florida’s tropical birds, becoming one of the environmental movement’s first martyrs."
creator: Krista Stevens

title: Richard Misrach on the Eerie Grandeur of Global Trade
content: "Rebecca Solnit considers the photographer’s recent work tracing histories of shipping routes and their impact on the natural environment."
creator: Brendan Fitzgerald

title: Brass Bands
content: "I quite like the brass band version of ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’, but I’m not sure it’s what Freddie Mercury had in mind."
creator: Krista Stevens

title: She Tried to Kill a President. He Loved Her Anyway.
content: "A retired widower married Sara Jane Moore, who shot at President Ford in 1975. It tore his family apart."
creator: Brendan Fitzgerald

title: I Rewatch “Gilmore Girls” to Remember my Stepfather
content: "I find echoes of the man who raised me every time I watch the iconic mother-daughter show."
creator: Carolyn Wells

title: You’ve Heard About Who ICE Is Recruiting. The Truth Is Far Worse. I’m the Proof.
content: "What happens when you do minimal screening before hiring agents, arming them, and sending them into the streets? We’re all finding out."
creator: Krista Stevens

title: The Top 5 Longreads of the Week
content: In this edition: ICE fighter, tectonic researcher, prairie preserver, regal grandmother, wild timekeeper.
creator: Longreads

title: Where the Prairie Still Remains
content: "Are pioneer cemeteries key to the Iowa prairie’s revival, or its final resting place?"
creator: Carolyn Wells
